content.text: Write 2067 in words
Write 2067 correct to the nearest hundred
A cruise ship travels 2067 km
When full, the cruise ship carries 880 guests and 360 crew
Write the ratio guests : crew in its simplest form
There are 480 cabins on the ship
On one cruise, 456 of these cabins were used
Find the percentage of cabins that were used
Last year the cost of a cruise was \(\)4600
This year the cost of the same cruise is \(\)4784
Work out the percentage increase in the cost
The cost of building the ship was \(\)1530000\$000
Write 153 000 000 in standard form
Show that there are 120 Ocean-view cabins on the ship
The table shows information about each type of cabin

table.html:
Type of cabinNumber of cabinsSector angle in a pie chart
Ocean-view12090°
Balcony192144°
Interior68
Suite100

content.text: There are 480 cabins on the ship
There are four types of cabin: Ocean-view, Balcony, Interior and Suite
Hannah starts to draw a pie chart to show the numbers of each type of cabin
a multiple of 23,
a factor of 120,
a common multiple of 8 and 12,
a number that is both square and odd,
a number that has exactly 2 factors
Using numbers from 55 to 85, write down
Write 220 as the product of its prime factors
Complete the table of values for \(y = 1 + 5x - x^2\)
On the grid, draw the graph of \(y = 1 + 5x - x^2\) for \(-1 \leqslant x \leqslant 5\)
On the grid, draw the line \(y = 3\)
Use your line to solve the equation \(1 + 5x - x^2 = 3\)
The diagram shows the plan of part of Rachel's garden
Calculate the area
Rachel has a pond in her garden in the shape of a circle
The circumference of the pond is \(4.25 \text{m}\)
Calculate the diameter of the pond
Give your answer in centimetres
A plant pot is a cylinder with radius \(15\mathrm{cm}\) and height \(24\mathrm{cm}\)
Calculate the volume of the pot
The diagram shows two mathematically similar plant pots
The smaller pot has height \(21.6\mathrm{cm}\) and diameter \(27\mathrm{cm}\)
The larger pot has diameter \(33\mathrm{cm}\)
Find the height, \(h\), of the larger pot
A shop sells bags of compost in three different sizes
Work out which size of bag gives the best value
Show how you decide
Find the range of the times
Find the median maximum power
Complete the scatter diagram
The first eight points have been plotted for you
What type of correlation is shown on the scatter diagram?
Describe the relationship between the maximum power of a car and the time taken to accelerate from 0 to \(100\mathrm{km / h}\)
Draw a line of best fit on the scatter diagram
Another car has a maximum power of \(63\mathrm{kW}\)
Use your line of best fit to estimate the time taken for this car to accelerate from 0 to \(100\mathrm{km / h}\)
Robert buys a car for \(\) 18$ 160
He pays a deposit of \(\) 6460$
He pays the rest of the money in 24 equal monthly payments
Work out the amount of each monthly payment
A fuel tank holds 52 litres when full
The tank is a quarter full
Jim fills the tank with fuel that costs \(\) 2.18$ per litre
Work out how much Jim pays
The table shows the maximum power, kW, and the time taken, in seconds, to accelerate from 0 to \(100\mathrm{km / h}\) for each of 10 cars
On the grid, draw the image of
Describe fully the **single** transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto triangle \(B\)
Describe fully the **single** transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto triangle \(C\)
triangle \(A\) after a reflection in the line \(x = 3\)
Find the value of \(W\) when \(a = 6\) and \(c = 2\)
Factorise completely
Make \(m\) the subject of the formula \(y = 4m - p\)
Find the value of \(x\) when \(5^{x} \times 5^{3} = 5^{12}\)
Find the value of
In this part, all measurements are in centimetres
The diagram shows a kite with sides \((2x + 5)\) and \((3x - 1)\)
The perimeter of the kite is \(33 \mathrm{cm}\)
Work out the length of a shorter side
Write down the mathematical name for the line \(PQ\)
Explain why angle \(OPB\) is \(90^{\circ}\)
Find the value of \(x\)
\(P\) and \(Q\) are points on the circle, centre \(O\)
\(APB\) is a tangent to the circle at \(P\)
Find the value of \(a\)
Give a reason for your answer
Find the value of \(b\)
Give a reason for your answer
Find the value of \(c\)
The diagram shows two parallel lines and two straight lines
Calculate the value of \(x\)
Draw Pattern 4
Complete the table
the number of black counters in Pattern \(n\),
the number of white counters in Pattern \(n\)
Write an expression, in terms of \(n\), for
Elena has 30 black counters and 140 white counters
Can she make Pattern 12 using her counters?
Explain your answer
.........  because
A sequence of patterns is made using black counters and white counters
